name: relsnop

stmt.origin: mp2an(wrel(csn(cop(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(Rel({ < c0, c1 > }), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wrel(csn(cop(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wrel(csn(cop(c0, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(csn(cop(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wrel(csn(cop(c0, c1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wrel(csn(cop(c0, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(csn(cop(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: A singleton of an ordered pair is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1998.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
